name: 2006 Simulator
description:
Relive 2006 in your nerd-haven bedroom! With full CRT, Wii, DVD goodness.

Created in Clickteam Fusion 2.5 for a small game jam between friends.

Team:

  • Design & Development: Jamie (@14cuttingj), Yeung (xHowie)
  • Visuals: Leigh (@kidzombie_)
  • Sound: Adam (@ADAMANT1UM97)
